ValidationRule.description: Validate that any Service Territory of type Branch, Office, and Area must have a Parent Territory populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( SFS_Service_Territory_Type__c , 'Branch'), ISPICKVAL( SFS_Service_Territory_Type__c , 'Area'), ISPICKVAL( SFS_Service_Territory_Type__c , 'Office') ), ISBLANK( ParentTerritory.Id ) ) , true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Parent Territory must be set for Service Territory of type Branch, Office, and Area
